a type of pear (= a sweet fruit with small seeds that has a round base and is slightly pointed towards the stem) with firm flesh and brown or dark yellow skin: The bosc has a very high sugar content and makes a delicious tart. Turn the fruit halfway through cooking, as Bosc pears have a tendency to dry out if overcooked.
